name: DSC-RU-BOT
description: whatsapp multi device bot by Rongo University students build with nodejs on baileys

MODS.description: Set the mods of the bot. Please use @s.whatsapp.net at the end and use , if u r adding multiple numbers. Ex: 254718241545@s.whatsapp.net, 254xxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net

APPNAME.description: It will throw a get request to your app every 5 minutes interval.

PASSWORD.description: Password to deploy this bot, ivailable in GDSC chats (Royce)

MONGODB.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)
